events.name: Diplomatic Expulsions Between Canada and India
events.wd_label: Diplomatic Expulsions Between Canada and India
events.wd_description: Canada and India have engaged in tit-for-tat diplomatic expulsions following allegations by Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau that India was involved in a state-sponsored assassination on Canadian soil.
events.description: Canada and India have engaged in tit-for-tat diplomatic expulsions following allegations by Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau that India was involved in a state-sponsored assassination on Canadian soil.

events.name: Trudeau's Allegations
events.wd_description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau alleged that India was involved in the assassination of Sikh independence advocate Hardeep Singh Niijar in Surrey, British Columbia in June.
events.description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau alleged that India was involved in the assassination of Sikh independence advocate Hardeep Singh Niijar in Surrey, British Columbia in June.

events.name: Canada's Diplomatic Expulsion
events.wd_description: Canada expelled Pavan Kumar Rai, the most senior member of India’s foreign intelligence agency operating in Canada.
events.description: Canada expelled Pavan Kumar Rai, the most senior member of India’s foreign intelligence agency operating in Canada.

events.name: India's Retaliation
events.wd_description: India retaliated by ordering a senior Canadian diplomat to leave the country within five days.
events.description: India retaliated by ordering a senior Canadian diplomat to leave the country within five days.

events.name: International Response
events.wd_description: British Foreign Secretary James Cleverly expressed support for Canada’s investigation and expects India to cooperate.
events.description: British Foreign Secretary James Cleverly expressed support for Canada’s investigation and expects India to cooperate.

events.name: French Diplomats Held Hostage in Niger
events.wd_label: French Diplomats Held Hostage in Niger
events.wd_description: French President Emmanuel Macron revealed that the French ambassador to Niger and other French diplomats are being held hostage at the French embassy in Niamey following the military junta's takeover.
events.description: French President Emmanuel Macron revealed that the French ambassador to Niger and other French diplomats are being held hostage at the French embassy in Niamey following the military junta's takeover.

events.name: Macron's Revelation
events.wd_description: French President Emmanuel Macron disclosed during a visit to the Cote d’Or region that the French ambassador to Niger and other diplomats are being held hostage at the French embassy.
events.description: French President Emmanuel Macron disclosed during a visit to the Cote d’Or region that the French ambassador to Niger and other diplomats are being held hostage at the French embassy.

events.name: Conditions at the Embassy
events.wd_description: Food is not being delivered to the embassy in Niamey, and the diplomats are eating military rations.
events.description: Food is not being delivered to the embassy in Niamey, and the diplomats are eating military rations.

events.name: Background of the Expulsion Order
events.wd_description: The French ambassador, Sylvian Itte, was ordered to leave Niger after the military junta seized control, but France refused to recognize the junta's authority and ordered the ambassador to remain.
events.description: The French ambassador, Sylvian Itte, was ordered to leave Niger after the military junta seized control, but France refused to recognize the junta's authority and ordered the ambassador to remain.

events.name: Macron's Response
events.wd_description: President Macron stated he is in contact with ousted President Mohamed Bazoum and will act in accordance with their discussions regarding the ambassador's situation.
events.description: President Macron stated he is in contact with ousted President Mohamed Bazoum and will act in accordance with their discussions regarding the ambassador's situation.

events.name: Ukrainian Attack on Naval Targets in Crimea
events.wd_label: Ukrainian Attack on Naval Targets in Crimea
events.wd_description: Ukraine has confirmed responsibility for a significant attack on naval targets and port infrastructure in Crimea, described as one of the largest strikes on the Russian navy’s Black Sea fleet.
events.description: Ukraine has confirmed responsibility for a significant attack on naval targets and port infrastructure in Crimea, described as one of the largest strikes on the Russian navy’s Black Sea fleet.

events.name: Details of the Attack
events.wd_description: Ukraine launched 10 missiles, causing a large fire at a Sevastopol shipyard and injuring 24 people. A large landing vessel and a submarine were hit.
events.description: Ukraine launched 10 missiles, causing a large fire at a Sevastopol shipyard and injuring 24 people. A large landing vessel and a submarine were hit.

events.name: Ukrainian Confirmation
events.wd_description: Ukrainian military intelligence official Andriy Yusov confirmed the strike, while the head of Ukraine’s air force thanked pilots, suggesting the weaponry was launched by Ukrainian aircraft.
events.description: Ukrainian military intelligence official Andriy Yusov confirmed the strike, while the head of Ukraine’s air force thanked pilots, suggesting the weaponry was launched by Ukrainian aircraft.

events.name: Russian Response
events.wd_description: Russia’s Ministry of Defense confirmed that both vessels will be fully repaired and continue in normal service.
events.description: Russia’s Ministry of Defense confirmed that both vessels will be fully repaired and continue in normal service.
